languages.text: "Последний маяк не спасти от тринадцатой бури! Любимый сын заблудшего отца разверзнет пасть!"

traits.locale_text: "Последний маяк не спасти от тринадцатой бури! Любимый сын заблудшего отца разверзнет пасть!"

languages.text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
languages.original_text: "Последний маяк не спасти от тринадцатой бури! Любимый сын заблудшего отца разверзнет пасть!"

traits.locale_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
"The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
"The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
"The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
"The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
"The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"

languages.text: «¡El último faro no puede salvarse de la decimotercera tormenta! ¡El querido hijo del padre descarriado pronto abrirá sus voraces fauces!».
languages.original_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"

traits.locale_text: «¡El último faro no puede salvarse de la decimotercera tormenta! ¡El querido hijo del padre descarriado pronto abrirá sus voraces fauces!».

languages.text: 「最後のビーコンは、13回目の嵐から救えません！信仰を捨てた父の愛息子が、男のマウをぱっくりと開くのです！」
languages.original_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"

traits.locale_text: 「最後のビーコンは、13回目の嵐から救えません！信仰を捨てた父の愛息子が、男のマウをぱっくりと開くのです！」

languages.text: “最后的灯塔必将在第十三次风暴中熄灭！已故父亲的爱子即将张开他的巨口！”
languages.original_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"

traits.locale_text: “最后的灯塔必将在第十三次风暴中熄灭！已故父亲的爱子即将张开他的巨口！”

languages.text: "Das letzte Signal kann nicht vor dem dreizehnten Sturm gerettet werden! Der geliebte Sohn des vergangenen Vaters wird seinen gähnenden Schlund öffnen!"
languages.original_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"

traits.locale_text: "Das letzte Signal kann nicht vor dem dreizehnten Sturm gerettet werden! Der geliebte Sohn des vergangenen Vaters wird seinen gähnenden Schlund öffnen!"

languages.text: « La dernière balise ne pourra pas être sauvée de la treizième tempête ! Le fils bien-aimé du père déchu ouvrira sa gueule béante ! »
languages.original_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"

traits.locale_text: « La dernière balise ne pourra pas être sauvée de la treizième tempête ! Le fils bien-aimé du père déchu ouvrira sa gueule béante ! »

languages.text: "Son fener, on üçüncü fırtınadan sağ çıkmayacak! İnancını terk eden babanın kıymetli oğlu, yakında esneyerek ağzını açacak!"
languages.original_text: "The last beacon cannot be saved from the thirteenth storm! The lapsed father's beloved son will open his yawning maw!"
